Trade/Device Name(s): CONTOUR® LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CONTOUR LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitor
Medtronic MiniMed Paradigm REAL-Time Revel Insulin Pump
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bayer CONTOUR LINK Wireless Blood Glucose Monitoring System with RF capability for transmitting results to insulin pumps
Indications for Use Summary: OTC device for single-patient, home monitoring of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, intended for transmission to compatible Medtronic insulin pumps, not for diagnosis/screening or neonatal use
